body.name: Iaret Smart Watch for Women Men (Answer/Make Call), Fitness Tracker for Android iOS Phones Waterproof Smartwatch 1.7" HD Full Touch Screen Activity Trackers Heart Rate Sleep Monitor Pedometer, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 16 mins
features: CALL RECEIVING/DIALING: After connecting to Bluetooth, you can directly make calls and answer calls on your watch. Iaret smart watch with text and call supports quick communication, information reminder, social media notification( Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter, etc.). With all notifications displayed on your wrist and alerted by vibration, you can keep your phone in your pocket without missing any important calls or messages when you're out walking, exercising, or seeing friends.

SMART WATCHES FOR WOMEN MEN: Ultra-thin metal frame with 1.7" HD full touch color screen brings smooth touch and excellent visual experience. Dial store has 100+ free dials for you to choose from, you can also change your favorite picture as a watch face with one click. Comes with 2 bands, the stainless steel one is exquisite, while the silicone band is more casual.

ALL-ROUND HEALTH MONITORING: This smart watch can detect your 24/7 heart rate, blood pressure and blood oxygen to get a better understanding of your health (Not for medical use). The high-performance motion sensor monitors sleep status automatically and provides comprehensive sleep quality analysis (deep sleep, light sleep and awake). You can also use the Female Physiological Cycle, Drink Reminder and Sedentary Reminder features to help you make reasonable adjustment on your lifestyle.

ALL DAY ACTIVITY & FITNESS TRACKER: As a precision fitness watch, the activity trackers support 8 sports modes: walking, running, cycling, skipping, badminton, basketball, football, swimming. The fitness trackers for women men accurately track all-day activities such as steps, distance, calories, exercise time and heart rate. And you can use the stopwatch tool to time your run. The best choice for fitness enthusiasts.

EVERYDAY FEATURES AT THE READY: iOS Android smart watch for women men is equipped with a 230 mAh large capacity battery, only takes 2 hours to get fully charged and can be used for 3-7 days (Note: depends on individual usage). IP67 waterproof watch, so you don't have to take off while washing your hands, not suitable for diving, shower or sauna. More practical tools such as mobile music playback and photo control, weather display, find watch, timer, alarm clock, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Iaet Smartwatch Make and Receive Calls Bluetooth Voice Call Watch: Bluetooth Call Smartwatch/Receive Messages/SNS Notification(Can not reply message). Clear bluetooth call texture, free your hands anytime, anywhere, make answering and making calls more efficient, easy to deal with home, work, sports and other scenarios. You can keep your phone in your pocket without missing any important calls or messages! All-round Health Monitoring: Heart Rate/Blood Oxygen/Blood Pressure Monitor Watch, Sleep Tracker WatchFitness Tracker: Multiple exercise modes, display steps, distance, calories, exercise time and heart rateSmart Watch For Android And Ios Phones: Support iOS 7.1 and above, Android 4.4 and above A variety of functions, let you enjoy the life experience that technology brings to you.

Your Ultimate Fitness Assistant You can check the exercise distance, speed, heart rate change, calories burned, etc. on the activity tracker watch to help you record data while exercising, so you can get in perfect figure and exercise more professionally. Provides 8 sports modes (walking, running, cycling, skipping, badminton, basketball, football, and swimming).

The new multifunctional Bluetooth call smart watch makes your life more convenient and comfortable Weather Forecast: Keep your phone and watch connected, and the watch can synchronize the weather forecast function. You can see the air quality index and the recent weather conditions on the fitness watch.Remote Control Camera: You can take selfies or group photos with better pose or photo vision. Turn on the camera function in the "Da Fit" app and easily control your phone camera with the smart wristband.IP67 Waterproof: The water resistant design is perfect for sports enthusiasts. You can wear this men's watch whether it's for daily hand washing or rainy days. Note: please don't use in diving, hot water, or environment with corrosive liquids and hot steam. The waterproof function is not permanently effective, and the protective performance may be reduced due to daily wear and tear.Stopwatch And Timer Function: Which can help you calculate how much time you need for each exercise or complete the training within the target time, allowing you to indirectly increase the exercise intensity, and help you track and optimize the training effect. More Practical functions are waiting for you to explore!

Multi-dial Design Let Your Personality Fly Customized Dial: You can pick any one of over 100 online dials from the dial center of the "Da Fit" app, or you can DIY your own watchface. Make the watch truly yours, reject mediocrity and express yourself. Full Touch Color Screen: Ultra-thin metal frame with 1.7" HD full touch color screen, the Minimalist and sporty design brings you a different visual experience

All-round Health Monitoring Pedometer: Fitness tracker watch for men can track calories, distance, steps, exercise time etc.. You can view exercise data in the APP, which can help you track and optimize training effects.Sleep Tracker: Automatically monitor and analyze sleep quality (21:00-10:00). This watch records the time you spend in deep and light sleep as well as awake, you can set a silent vibration alert on the "Da Fit" app to wake you up without disturbing your family. Heart Rate Monitor: Monitors heart rate 24/7, you can get heart rate intervals on the watch when it syncs with the watch and shows you all the details with charts so you know your physical condition at any time of the day.Blood Oxygen Monitoring: Running watch can monitor blood oxygen, and you can visually check blood oxygen and average/maximum/minimum data in the APP to provide more in-depth insights into your health.Blood Pressure Monitoring: Best smart watches for women men has a blood pressure monitoring function, and the monitoring data will be recorded on the APP. The smart watch monitoring data is for reference only and cannot be used for medical purposes.

Sync Health Data & Menu Style Support data synchronization with Apple Health and Google Fit.Read and Write permissions can be enabled. Two menu styles for you to choose, you can choose list menu or cellular men

Tips: Read carefully how to link two bluetooths, divided into two steps Please note that this watch is dual Bluetooth (APP Bluetooth and mobile phone (audio) Bluetooth) A：*The first Bluetooth,App's Bluetooth (Da Fit) Turn on Phone'S BluetoothFind and enter Play Storeor App StoreAfter searching and downloading, enter Da Fit appEnter app and find I18 to bind（Please fully charged it when the first time to use） B: *The second bluetooth，(Call receiving/dial)function of Bluetooth link Swipe down the screen, tap the "Settings" icon, and turn on the "Call" function switchOpen phone's setting and turn on the BluetoothFind another I18 and click it to connectAfter connection, you can use the watch to（Call receiveing/Dial）calls

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrible Accuracy - Great Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: This watch keeps good time BUT that's all. All other funtion are extremely inaccurate. Looks good but that's all.UPDATE: I've had this watch for 5 months and I get a lot of compliments on it. The company offered me a full refund that I declined to take but I'm changing my review to 5 stars for their excellent customer service.🙂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Smart Watch
reviews.reviewText: It's a great smart watch. Good battery life, looks beautiful, three high quality bands to choose from (2 silicone and one metallic). Watch looks awesome with all three. You can both receive and make calls with the inbuilt dialpad. Speakerphone is loud and clear. You can play music. You get notifications from Whatsapp, Google / Android text messages, Facebook on the phone and you can read it. Lots of dial faces to choose from. You can use your own pictures also as the dial face. The protective covers are easily available and not pricey. Pulse, SPO² and other health tracking features are also available. Haven't checked the accuracy of those readings. Overall a very good purchase. Infact I ended up purchasing another one because I liked it. App features and phone connectivity are also top notch.Only feature that I wish it had was the ability to send messages as well instead of just being able to read your incoming messages. That would have made this watch just awesome. Either or, it was a great purchase for me both times. The seller also follows up via email after each purchase. Kudos for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The smart watch is very nice but instructions are vague and not detailed enough. I am not sure if the watch doesn't work right or if the instructions are so vague that I don'tn understand how to program it. I can message the company and they help some but not enough, I still can't transfer my favorite contacts from my phone to the watch and can't enter the numbers manually either. Very frustrating!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sleep tracking time window locked. Have to use DaFit app.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this watch mainly for sleep tracking, I knew it wasn't going to be super accurate as it's cheap, but the sleep times are locked to a "normal" night time sleep window. I have insomnia and wanted to see how much sleep I was getting, I look at the watch past 10pm and it says I'm asleep when I'm awake. I slept for about 3.5 hours the second night I had it on and it recorded over 9hours.Bluetooth connection drops if you're more than a few feet from your phone, so you're not going to get those calls or notifications. Defeats the purpose of the bluetooth if you don't want to have to bring your phone everywhere. Want to leave your phone on a close table while you're getting dirty? Not going to be able to answer the phone call on the watch.You can only add up to 8 contacts to the watch but they constantly disappear. It took me an hour to figure out that I had to go into my phone and add a country code (+1) to every contact I wanted to add or it won't show up to add in the app.DaFit app is the only way to connect this watch to your phone, it's seriously lacking. You cannot edit anything. You cannot adjust sleep recorded. You can only add one customized watch face and can't delete the 3 preloaded ones.Another watch I bought on the cheap orange shopping app for about $12 had many more features and functions and used the HryFine app that is worlds ahead of this one, I only bought this one because my last smartwatch one broke.Only positive things I have to say is that the battery life is decent, I had it on for around 48 hours from the time I set up and charged it until I gave up on the DaFit app and put it back in the box a day ago and the battery is at 74% when leaving the watch face setting to off unless turned on by the side button. It seems to be built pretty solidly, the watch straps are ok, it came with a metal one and a silicone one.I will be returning this watch. Wish I would have looked at the Amazon and DaFit app reviews before wasting my time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seriously Amazing Smart Watch for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to buy this watch because of the low price but I am so glad I did. The watch is easy to read and stylish. I bought it mainly to track my steps but I am finding myself using all the features of the watch. It was easily paired with my phone and works well! I especially love the heart rate monitor and blood pressure monitor. You can’t beat it for the price! The only thing that I would change is the sensitivity of the watch when changing screens. Sometimes the screen switches when I do not intend it to. I am not 100% sure if I can adjust this (I will find out) a very minor issue that I certainly can live with! Great value for the price! I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars battery runs out in 2 days
reviews.reviewText: I initially got a cheapo cheapo smart watch that cost about $15, to see if I would even like one. And I found out that I did. I use it mostly for the sleep, steps, time, certain notifications, and stopwatch.So I upgraded to this one and it looks better. Silver metal band. But the battery dies out after 2 days.And I am not sure if the steps are accurate, as I was in a zoom meeting and by the end of it had added 600 steps to my daily total when I didn't move from my chair (sometimes there is a delay in updating the step counter, so it could have been that, as well, I just don't know).And sleep. The cheapo one I had initially showed the times I got up to go to the bathroom or took my dog out to go potty. This one doesn't.So how accurate is it? I don't know. I want one that's accurate because I am on a sleep protocol and for the first time in my 48 years of life, am sleeping 8+ hours per night! It is a game changer for me, so being able to track my sleep helps me feel like I am giving myself gold stars. hah!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I Love that you can change the band, the battery life is great and you can make calls and answer through the watch. I also like that it counts my step and other features. I really love my watch !!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of features!
reviews.reviewText: 10/10. It would have been better if I could reply to text and get my contacts on the watch but it's doing exactly what I bought it for, those were just extras ;)
Relógio muito bonito, mas a bateria descarrega muito rápido!

muy satisfecho con el reloj tiene todo lo que mencionan, lo único es q la pila se baja rápido, claro ha de ser por que enciende el reloj con el movimiento, configurándolo para q no encienda cada vez la pila duraría mas., en general muy a gusto con el producto.
Comprei o relógio e não durou nem 3 meses soltou a tela...
A bateria não dura qse nada. Comprei oq mina esposa e a bateria não dura uma noite. Fala que med o sono ma desliga muito antes. Pelo preço não ake a pena
Totalmente insatisfeita, é o relógio pega trouxa. Não comprem. Péssimo.Quase peguei um martelo e quebrei.
